markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1950) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 170 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=57)

</column>

---

You're exceptional in your use of two weapons. You gain the [Double Slice](/Feats.aspx?ID=356) fighter feat. This serves as Double Slice for the purpose of meeting prerequisites.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you gain two other feats from the dual-weapon warrior archetype.

<title level="2">Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication leads to...</title>
[Dual Onslaught](/Feats.aspx?ID=1955), [Dual Thrower](/Feats.aspx?ID=1951), [Dual-Weapon Blitz](/Feats.aspx?ID=1954), [Dual-Weapon Reload](/Feats.aspx?ID=1952), [Flensing Slice](/Feats.aspx?ID=1953)
name: Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication
